name: Managed Service for MySQL — Host overview

targets.query: alias(series_max("name", {service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", name="/porto/cpu_wait|/porto/cpu_usage|/porto/cpu_usage_system", host="{{host}}", dc!="by_node|by_host|total", node="primary|replica"}), "{{name}}")

alias(series_max("name", trunc({name="/porto/memory_usage", service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}", dc!="by_node|by_host|total", node="primary|replica"})), "{{name}}")
alias(trunc(series_max("/porto/io_read"{service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}", dc!="by_node|by_host|total", node="primary|replica"})), "Read")
alias(trunc(series_max("/porto/io_write"{service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}", dc!="by_node|by_host|total", node="primary|replica"})), "Write")
alias(trunc(series_max("/porto/io_ops"{service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}", dc!="by_node|by_host|total", node="primary|replica"})), "{{name}}")
alias(series_max(trunc("/porto/net_rx_packets"{service="mdb", dc!="by_node|by_host|total", node="primary|replica", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}"})), "Received")
alias(series_max(trunc("/porto/net_tx_packets"{service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}", dc!="by_node|by_host|total", node="primary|replica"})), "Sent")
alias(series_max(trunc("/porto/net_tx_bytes"{service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}", dc!="by_node|by_host|total", node="primary|replica"})), "Sent")
alias(series_max(trunc("/porto/net_rx_bytes"{service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}", dc!="by_node|by_host|total", node="primary|replica"})), "Received")
alias(series_max(floor({name="mysql_replication_lag", node="by_host", service="mdb", dc="by_host", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}"})), "replication_lag")
alias(series_max({name="mysql_Slow_queries_rate", node="by_host", service="mdb", dc="by_host", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}"}), "slow_queries")
alias(series_max({name="mysql_Questions_rate", node="by_host", service="mdb", dc="by_host", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}"}), "queries")
alias(series_max({name="mysql_latency_query_0.5", node="by_host", service="mdb", dc="by_host", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}"}), "50%")
alias(series_max({name="mysql_latency_query_0.75", node="by_host", service="mdb", dc="by_host", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}"}), "75%")
alias(series_max({name="mysql_latency_query_0.90", node="by_host", service="mdb", dc="by_host", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}"}), "90%")
alias(series_max({name="mysql_latency_query_0.95", node="by_host", service="mdb", dc="by_host", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}"}), "95%")
alias(series_max({name="mysql_latency_query_0.99", node="by_host", service="mdb", dc="by_host", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}"}), "99%")
alias(series_max({name="mysql_latency_query_avg", node="by_host", service="mdb", dc="by_host", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}"}), "avg")
alias(series_max({name="mysql_Innodb_rows_deleted_rate", node="by_host", service="mdb", dc="by_host", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}"}), "innodb_rows_deleted")
alias(series_max({name="mysql_Innodb_rows_inserted_rate", node="by_host", service="mdb", dc="by_host", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}"}), "innodb_rows_inserted")
alias(series_max({name="mysql_Innodb_rows_updated_rate", node="by_host", service="mdb", dc="by_host", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}"}), "innodb_rows_updated")
alias(series_max({name="mysql_Innodb_rows_read_rate", node="by_host", service="mdb", dc="by_host", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}"}), "innodb_rows_read")

alias(series_max({name="mysql_Innodb_row_lock_current_waits", node="by_host", service="mdb", dc="by_host", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}"}), "innodb_row_lock_current_waits")
alias(series_max({name="mysql_Innodb_row_lock_waits_rate", node="by_host", service="mdb", dc="by_host", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}"}), "innodb_row_lock_waits")
alias(series_max({name="mysql_Threads_cached", node="by_host", service="mdb", dc="by_host", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}"}), "threads_cached")
alias(series_max({name="mysql_Threads_connected", node="by_host", service="mdb", dc="by_host", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}"}), "threads_connected")
alias(series_max({name="mysql_Threads_running", node="by_host", service="mdb", dc="by_host", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}"}), "threads_running")

top_max(10, alias(series_max("filetype", {name="mysql_fileio_write_bytes", dc!="by_node|by_host|total", node="primary|replica", service="mdb",  project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}"}), "{{filetype}}"))

top_max(10, alias(series_max("filetype", {name="mysql_fileio_read_bytes", dc!="by_node|by_host|total", node="primary|replica", service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}"}), "{{filetype}}"))
alias(series_max({service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", name="disk-used_bytes_mysql_data", node="by_host", dc="by_host", host="{{host}}"}), "data")
alias(series_max({service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", name="disk-used_bytes_mysql_binlogs", node="by_host", dc="by_host", host="{{host}}"}), "binlogs")
alias(series_max({service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", name="disk-used_bytes_mysql_relaylogs", node="by_host", dc="by_host", host="{{host}}"}), "relaylogs")

alias(series_max({service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", name="disk-used_bytes_mysql_default_tablespace", node="by_host", dc="by_host", host="{{host}}"}), "default_tablespace")
alias(series_max({service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", name="disk-used_bytes_mysql_innodb_logs", node="by_host", dc="by_host", host="{{host}}"}), "innodb_logs")
alias(series_max({service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", name="disk-used_bytes_mysql_temp_tablespace", node="by_host", dc="by_host", host="{{host}}"}), "temp_tablespace")
alias(series_max({service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", name="disk-used_bytes_mysql_undo_tablespace", node="by_host", dc="by_host", host="{{host}}"}), "undo_tablespace")

top_max(10, alias(series_max("filetype", {name="mysql_fileio_writes", service="mdb", dc!="by_node|by_host|total", node="primary|replica", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}"}), "{{filetype}}"))

top_max(10, alias(series_max("filetype", {name="mysql_fileio_reads", dc!="by_node|by_host|total", node="primary|replica", service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}"}), "{{filetype}}"))

alias(series_max({name="mysql_Created_tmp_disk_tables_rate", node="by_host", service="mdb", dc="by_host", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}"}), "created_tmp_disk_tables")
alias(series_max({name="mysql_Created_tmp_files_rate", node="by_host", service="mdb", dc="by_host", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}"}), "created_tmp_files")
alias(series_max({name="mysql_Created_tmp_tables_rate", node="by_host", service="mdb", dc="by_host", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}"}), "created_tmp_tables")
alias(series_max({name="mysql_Sort_range_rate", node="by_host", service="mdb", dc="by_host", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}"}), "sort_range")
alias(series_max({name="mysql_Sort_scan_rate", node="by_host", service="mdb", dc="by_host", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}"}), "sort_scan")
alias(series_max({name="mysql_Select_full_join_rate", node="by_host", service="mdb", dc="by_host", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}"}), "select_full_join")
alias(series_max("mysql_Select_full_range_join_rate"{node="by_host", service="mdb", dc="by_host", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}"}), "select_full_range_join")

alias(series_max({name="mysql_Innodb_buffer_pool_reads_rate", node="by_host", service="mdb", dc="by_host", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}"}), "innodb_buffer_pool_reads")

alias(series_max({name="mysql_Innodb_buffer_pool_read_requests_rate", node="by_host", service="mdb", dc="by_host", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}"}), "innodb_buffer_pool_read_requests")
alias(series_max({name="mysql_Open_tables", node="by_host", service="mdb", dc="by_host", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}"}), "open_tables")
alias(series_max({name="mysql_Opened_tables_rate", node="by_host", service="mdb", dc="by_host", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}"}), "opened_tables")
alias(series_max({name="mysql_Table_open_cache_hits_rate", node="by_host", service="mdb", dc="by_host", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}"}), "table_open_cache_hits")

alias(series_max({name="mysql_Table_open_cache_misses_rate", node="by_host", service="mdb", dc="by_host", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}"}), "table_open_cache_misses")

top_max(10, alias(series_max("handler", {service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", name="mysql_handler", dc!="by_node|by_host|total", node="primary|replica", host="{{host}}"}), "Handler_{{handler}}"))
alias(series_max({name="mysql_Innodb_data_reads_rate", node="by_host", service="mdb", dc="by_host", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}"}), "innodb_data_reads")
alias(series_max({name="mysql_Innodb_data_writes_rate", node="by_host", service="mdb", dc="by_host", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}"}), "innodb_data_writes")
alias(series_max({name="mysql_Innodb_data_fsyncs_rate", node="by_host", service="mdb", dc="by_host", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}"}), "innodb_data_fsyncs")
alias(series_max({name="mysql_Innodb_row_lock_time_rate", node="by_host", service="mdb", dc="by_host", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}"}), "innodb_row_lock_time")

alias(series_max({name="mysql_Rpl_semi_sync_master_tx_wait_time_rate", node="by_host", service="mdb", dc="by_host", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}"}), "rpl_semi_sync_master_tx_wait_time")

alias(series_max({name="mysql_Rpl_semi_sync_master_tx_avg_wait_time", node="by_host", service="mdb", dc="by_host", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", host="{{host}}"}), "rpl_semi_sync_master_tx_avg_wait_time")
alias(series_max("stage", {service="mdb", project="internal-mdb", cluster="mdb_{{cluster}}", name="mysql_session", host="{{host}}", dc!="by_node|by_host|total"}), "{{stage}}")
